choices.txt: Shruti won a spelling bee with the word 'antediluvian'.
She’s been to 50& of America's national parks
She went to summer college-prep camp before the 8th and 10th grade
She has a cat named Peanut Brittle Medium

questions.title: Tell me how you really feel about the ocean?

choices.txt: Meh. I can take it or leave it
Lah-lah-love it!
I like to be around it, but not in it.
The sand, the stink, the visible human skin? No thanks to that, ma’am.

questions.title: Do ya pull on <a target='_blank' href='http://thoughtcatalog.com/nico-lang/2013/09/59-quick-slang-phrases-from-the-1920s-we-should-start-using-again/'>gasper<a/> when you drink your giggle water? (Yes means 'sometimes yes.'' Accept it.)

choices.txt: Yes
No

questions.title: Do you like to kiss often or for long periods of time?

choices.txt: No. But I make up for it.
Yes, but I’d like it to eventually lead to sex.
I could live on kisses alone!
Are you talking on the mouth only?

questions.title: What was Shruti’s career plan B?

choices.txt: Jazzercise instructor
Doctor
Disneyland actress
Forest Ranger

questions.title: But what is her extra special, secret fantasy job?

choices.txt: A Food Network TV host that travels the globe eating gross stuff
A broadway star! Jazz hands!
The founder of a non-culty southwestern artist commune
A princess. Duh.

questions.title: Do you have hobbies that involve the following?

choices.txt: balls
tools
utensils
hoarding
no, I do not

questions.title: What did Shruti wear on Halloween that one time?

choices.txt: A construction paper feather headband. (Indian! Get it?)
Edward Scissorhands
utensils
A princess. Duh.

questions.title: Which gif sums up how you feel about your job:

choices.txt: Benedict Cumberbatch: I might have quirky looks, but I can rock a suit and melt your heart and panties in a witty tête-à-tête.
Ryan Gosling: I'm the boy-next-door with a ukulele wholl build you a house and kiss you in the rain. Hey, girl.
Jason Sudeikis: I tend to fly in under the radar, but my hilarity and humility give me multi date staying power.
Channing Tatum: I am surprisingly intelligent and charming behind this “beefcake drug dealer” facade.
A beach with real waves; but somewhere with hiking, not a touristy luxury place.
Seeing the Northern Lights in Iceland or Greenland. Maaaagic!
Paris. I want to eat a block of cheese and drink a magnum of wine errday, son.
Detroit. No, I’m serious! I prefer real culture, not tourist traps.
Shrutster
Shruts
Shruti Fruiti
Shrums
Hairy legs. Sorry, I’m just not that enlightened.
I don’t really like to make hard and fast rules.
Is lying too obvious? Lying is a total dealbreaker.
Rom coms, as in me watching them with you. I have dignity.
Can I return them if they’re jerks? Just kidding. Sort of.
No thank you. Not. My. Jam.
I’m not sure if I’ll ever be totally sure, but it might be nice.
Great! I don’t want to end up like those weirdo childless couples that attend metaphysics conferences.

questions.title: Your thoughts on marriage, 80s hair metal edition:

choices.txt: “Once bitten, Twice Shy”
“I Was Made For Lovin' You”
“Every Rose Has Its Thorn”
“Burn In Hell”

questions.title: How do you feel about quiet time?

choices.txt: I need regularly occurring time to reflect and digest.
That's what long poos are for.
I always have something going, music, TV, radio. When it’s too quiet I get antsy.
I like the occasional time to meditate, but I rarely find the time. Have you met this city?
The Berenstain Bears and the Messy Room
A Room with a View
A View From a Bridge
The Bridges of Madison County
